alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 4:32PM EDT until August 25 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: The National Weather Service in Marquette has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Luce County in eastern Upper Michigan... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 432 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Whitefish Point to 8 miles west of Lower Tahquamenon Falls State Park to 9 miles southeast of Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Newberry, McMillan, Helmer, Soo Junction, Four Mile Corner, Dollarville, Pine Stump Junction, Betsy Lake, and Crisp Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
